description: Easy to make and budget friendly, this cream of celery soup recipe is a hearty, flavoursome dish and sure to be a hit with the family.
name: Cream Of Celery Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup thickened cream (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Heat oil and butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, celery, potato and garlic and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes. Add stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 minutes or until celery softens.

Remove saucepan from heat. Using a stick blender, blend until smooth, then stir through cream. Add celery salt and ground white pepper, then stir to combine. Ladle soup into bowls, swirl through extra cream, then serve topped with croutons and celery leaves.
